name: Chiroptera
description:
Chiroptera is an open exploration game where you play as a bat. Using only echolocation to reveal the environment, the player must navigate a perilous cave, avoid obstacles, and eat insects to find their way to the goal. Try to explore as many caves as possible! Use the space bar to use your echolocation and the arrow keys to fly.

Steven Butkus //Code
Emily Wolver//Art & Music
Uri Hamman //Art
Dylan Ilvento //Code
